About

Hi, I’m Jonah, a 25-year-old student of economics, entrepreneur, philanthropist, shutterbug and pixel pusher. I like typography, sushi and clean websites.

I encourage you to send me your suggestions regarding my logs. Your feedback is always appreciated. However, I am not always able to respond in an adequate amount of time, but I assure you that I will do my best to answer all emails as soon as possible.

You may also find me on Google+, Twitter1, Flickr and LinkedIn. My email address is owner@wiaderny.org. For additional privacy consider my PGP public key.

If you feel in need of additional information about the construction of this website, please be refered to the Colophon.

  1. Soon. Very soon.
